model_details.manufacturer_website: https://github.com/coqui-ai/TTS    and also updated engine    https://github.com/idiap/coqui-ai-TTS/
model_details.model_description:
VITS models come in single and multi-speaker variants. VITS (Conditional Variational Autoencoder with Adversarial Learning for End-to-End Text-to-Speech ) is an End-to-End (encoder -> vocoder together) TTS model that takes advantage of SOTA DL techniques like GANs, VAE, Normalizing Flows. It does not require external alignment annotations and learns the text-to-audio alignment using MAS, as explained in the paper. The model architecture is a combination of GlowTTS encoder and HiFiGAN vocoder. It is a feed-forward model with x67.12 real-time factor on a GPU. 

tts_models--en--vctk--vits is a good example of a multi speaker VITS model.
